timeline.bodyText: Wow, the built in formatter doesn't protect against this?  Ouch.
timeline.author: bitwiseman
timeline.diffHunk:

     /**
      * Create a new {@link Builder}.
-     * 
+     *

replies.bodyText: Ugh. My editor is supposed to be configured to remove trailing whitespace. Will clean this stuff up.
replies.author: Irialad

replies.bodyText: Oh! I see. My editor did remove it. Hah, now I understand.
replies.author: Irialad

replies.bodyText: Yeah, it's the autoformatter in the build that failed to catch these earlier. 😢
replies.author: bitwiseman

timeline.bodyText:
affiliation is not a required parameter.  We shouldn't force it to be added. Maybe add a DEFAULT to the enum?
https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/rest/reference/repos#list-repository-collaborators
timeline.author: bitwiseman

replies.bodyText: I see your point, I won't force it. I think the enum should map directly to the values in the SDK though, and I'd expect if default behavior is desired, they'd simply call the method with no args. What do you think?
replies.author: Irialad

replies.bodyText:
they'd simply call the method with no args

Exactly, but your change forces the addition of the affiliation to the API call (line 858 below).  So, your call how you want to do it, but this method call should result in a web api call that doesn't have affiliation arg.
replies.author: bitwiseman

timeline.author: bitwiseman

replies.bodyText: Oh! Lovely. I'll remove the superfluous calls.
replies.author: Irialad

replies.bodyText: Oh, wait, sorry.  This doesn't work.  The request builder with(String, Enum) is what does the toLowercase for you.   You're passing a Map.  Maybe switch to passing  a request builder?  It's okay if you want to keep this as is.
replies.author: bitwiseman

timeline.bodyText: This probably also use listUsers(...) right?
timeline.author: bitwiseman

replies.bodyText: listUsers does a few extra things, so that would negatively impact the speed of what is ostensibly the "fast" alternative. If that's a desirable change, I'm happy to make it.
replies.author: Irialad

replies.bodyText: This isn't the fast alternative, just a convenient one. Go ahead and change it.
replies.author: bitwiseman

replies.bodyText:
Is the javadoc in error and I should update that while I'm in here?
    /**
     * Gets the names of the collaborators on this repository. This method deviates from the principle of this library
     * but it works a lot faster than {@link #getCollaborators()}.
     *
     * @return the collaborator names
     * @throws IOException
     *             the io exception
     */
    public Set<String> getCollaboratorNames() throws IOException```
replies.author: Irialad

timeline.author: bitwiseman

replies.bodyText: I'll play around with that, and see if that leads to a more elegant result.
replies.author: Irialad

replies.bodyText: I like the with(...) method addition.
replies.author: bitwiseman

replies.bodyText: Ok, I think I have a slightly nicer way of passing things around. I think I'll shortly be done addressing feedback, and I'll record for the test and update the PR.
replies.author: Irialad
